snippet: A survey of consumer satisfaction among cellphone users found that RIM's BlackBerry is losing ground. On a scale of up to 100, RIM's aggregate satisfaction score is lowest, at 69. By contrast Apple, the index leader, scored 83.
abstract: A survey of consumer satisfaction among cellphone users found that RIM's BlackBerry is losing ground. On a scale of up to 100, RIM's aggregate satisfaction score is lowest, at 69. By contrast Apple, the index leader, scored 83.

snippet: Apple and several major book publishers asked a federal judge, Denise Cote, to dismiss the case, which alleges that the companies conspired to control the price of e-books.
abstract: Apple and several major book publishers asked a federal judge, Denise Cote, to dismiss the case, which alleges that the companies conspired to control the price of e-books.

headline.main: Judge Allows Class-Action Lawsuit on E-Book Pricing to Go Ahead

snippet: The company lost $163 million, or 75 cents a share, versus a profit of $64 million in the same quarter a year ago.
abstract: J C Penney posts a large loss as it continues its ambitious turnaround; quarterly sales dropped 20 percent; company lost $163 million in the quarter, or 75 cents a share, versus a profit of $64 million in the same quarter a year ago.

headline.main: J. C. Penney Posts Big Loss as 3 Retailers Gain
headline.print_headline: Penney Posts Big Loss as 3 Retailers Gain

snippet: Melvin Major Jr., of Miss Lily’s Bake Shop & Melvin’s Juice Box on West Houston Street, may be New York’s first celebrity juicer.

snippet: Smule, the software developer known for its musical apps for iPhones, has decided it will make Android software too. It would almost appear to be an act of betrayal, as Smule was among the first companies to highlight the appeal of making apps for...
abstract: Smule, the software developer known for its musical apps for iPhones, has decided it will make Android software too. It would almost appear to be an act of betrayal, as Smule was among the first companies to highlight the appeal of making apps for Apple's platform.

headline.main: Smule, Early Apple App Star, Finally Tries Android

snippet: The Internet Corporation for Assigned Names and Numbers, or Icann, is about to throw open the floodgates to new top-level domain names. While most security experts have criticized the change, one group sees an opportunity by creating what it says ...
abstract: The Internet Corporation for Assigned Names and Numbers, or Icann, is about to throw open the floodgates to new top-level domain names. While most security experts have criticized the change, one group sees an opportunity by creating what it says will be a secure top-level domain.

headline.main: Dot-Music, Dot-Sport and (Security Experts Hope) Dot-Secure

snippet: On May 15, 1911, the Supreme Court ordered the dissolution of Standard Oil Company, ruling it was in violation of the Sherman Antitrust Act.
